meanings.definition: Took part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I participated in a race at school.
meanings.sent2: She always participates in the school choir performances.
meanings.sent3: The cat participated in the game of hide and seek, but was easily found.
meanings.sent4: His heart participated in the excitement of the concert, beating faster with each song.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter filled the room as they participated in the game of charades.

meanings.definition: Joined in or shared in something.
meanings.sent1: The participated team celebrated their victory with high-fives.
meanings.sent2: She was a participated member of the book club, always eager to discuss the latest read.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with participated colors, making it stand out at the party.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a participated space, with everyone contributing plants and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The painting showcased a participated style, blending different techniques seamlessly.
